item.title: Recycle Your Cell Phone To Save A Gorilla
item.description:
Recycling old cell phones is beneficial for many reasons, with one significant reason being the protection of the Eastern Lowland Mountain Gorilla in the Democratic Republic of Congo. You might wonder how cell phone usage impacts gorillas in Africa. The answer lies in the interconnected nature of our ecosystem. item.title: There’s $$$ In E-Waste
item.description:
Imagine tossing a $100 bill in the trash. That’s essentially what’s happening when we discard old electronics, or e-waste. While it might not be actual cash, these devices hold significant monetary and material value that often gets overlooked. E-waste isn’t a new issue. It’s been accumulating since the days of bulky radios and TVs. However, the sheer volume of discarded electronics has skyrocketed due to rapid technological advancements and shorter product lifecycles...
